CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL(Priority__c, "High"), IMAGE("/resource/AccountHealthImages/AccountHealthImages/Red-Error.png", "Red Flag",16,16), IF (ISPICKVAL(Priority__c, "Medium"), IMAGE("/resource/AccountHealthImages/AccountHealthImages/yellow.jpg","Yellow Flag",16,16), IF (ISPICKVAL(Priority__c, "Low"), IMAGE("/resource/AccountHealthImages/AccountHealthImages/Green.png","Green Flag",16,16),"")))
CustomField.label: Account h
